description._content: DESCRIPTION: Portrait from the Soon Town barbershop. The barber shop was operated by Soon Town from 1930-1951. He did mole removal and collected whiskey but was not a drinker. The spelling for the name of the barbershop is given as Sun Town in the Vancouver City Directory, 420 Columbia Street, Vancouver, B.C. VPL Accession Number: 23767 Date: October 14, 1935 Photographer/Studio: Dominion Photo Co. SUBJECTS: Chinese Canadians, Barbershops, Portraits More information on our historical photograph collection: www.vpl.ca/historicalphotos
